Articles of Association

ARTICLE 20: AMENDMENT

Contents

  1. Article 20.1
  2. Article 20.2

Article 20.1

Any amendment to these Articles of Association shall be in writing and shall require unanimous consent of all Members at a Board Meeting.

Article 20.2

Amendment of the purpose and the activities of the Organization shall only be effective after approval by a Royal Decree in accordance with article 50, §3 of the Act. Amendments to the powers, the procedure of convocation and the decision-making of the Board, the conditions on which the members are informed of its decisions, the conditions for making amendments to the Articles of Association, the dissolution and liquidation of the Organization and the allocation of the assets of the Organization, must be executed before a Belgian notary in accordance with article 50, §3 of the Act.
